parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle in Vehicle Transport </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Load cargo vehicle inside vehicle if possible, returns bool based on whether the vehicle was able to be loaded.  Can also be used to unload a specific loaded vehicle or all loaded vehicles. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[setVehicleCargo]] cargo </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle carrying cargo </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  cargo: [[Object]] - cargo to put in vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - whether the vehicle was able to be loaded </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Blackfish with no vehicle cargo loaded
<code>_success = blackfish [[setVehicleCargo]] offroad; //true
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Blackfish with full cargo already loaded
<code>_success = blackfish [[setVehicleCargo]] offroad; //false
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
__________________________

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Unload specific loaded vehicle
<code>_success = [[objNull]] [[setVehicleCargo]] offroad; 
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Unload all vehicles
<code>_success = blackfish [[setVehicleCargo]] [[objNull]];
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
__________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma_3_Vehicle_in_Vehicle_Transport| Vehicle in Vehicle Transport ]] [[canVehicleCargo]] [[enableVehicleCargo]] [[getVehicleCargo]] [[isVehicleCargo]] [[vehicleCargoEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
